categories: Category:Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures

nodes.text: Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures

Star Wars: Forces of Destiny: Daring Adventures is a series of chapter books based on the animated micro-series Star Wars: Forces of Destiny, which adapt select episodes of the animated micro-series, while adding scenes and dialogue not originally present. Four books have been released.

Volume 1 features stories about Sabine Wren, Rey, and Senator Padmé Amidala. Ahsoka Tano, Ketsu Onyo, and the droids C1-10P "Chopper" and BB-8 also appear. The book adapts four episodes of the micro-series: Sands of Jakku, BB-8 Bandits, Newest Recruit, and The Imposter Inside, with additional scenes and introductions by Maz Kanata, not featured in the episodes. A message by Kanata is also included at the end. It was released on August 1, 2017.

Volume 2 features stories about Jyn Erso, Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, and Princess Leia Organa. The book adapts three episodes: The Padawan Path, Beasts of Echo Base, and The Stranger, with additional Maz Kanata scenes. It was released on October 3, 2017.

The Leia Chronicles features stories about Princess Leia Organa. It was released on January 2, 2018. This book adapts three episodes of the micro-series: Ewok Escape, An Imperial Feast, and Bounty of Trouble, with new scenes with Kanata.

The Rey Chronicles features stories about Rey. It was released on March 6, 2018. It adapts three episodes: Run Rey Run, The Happabore Hazard, and Tracker Trouble, with added introductions by Maz Kanata.
